concept.title: Installing HCL Sametime on an Android device
concept.shortdesc: Before you can use HCL Sametime on your Android device, you must install the HCL Sametime app.

conbody.p: By using the HCL Sametime app, you can synchronize communications among devices.

section.title: Prerequisites
section.p: The app supports Smartphone and tablets running Android OS 8.0 and higher.

section.title: Installing the app
section.p: To install the app, locate the HCL Sametime app in Google Play store and select Install. After you install the app, select Open to start it. The first time that you open the app, you must configure a community.
